Description: An access control policy shall be established documented and reviewed
Evidence: Access Control Policy v2.1 Last Review: 2024-01-15
Findings: Policy is current and well-documented

Description: The organization manages information system accounts
Evidence: Account management procedures documented
Findings: Missing automated account lifecycle management

Description: The entity implements logical access security software
Evidence: No evidence provided
Findings: Missing multi-factor authentication for privileged accounts
Remediation: Deploy MFA solution for all privileged access

Description: Detection reporting and recovery from malware attacks
Evidence: Antivirus deployment report; Latest signature updates
Findings: All systems have updated antivirus protection
Remediation: Monitor for new threats and update signatures

Description: The organization identifies reports and corrects information system flaws
Evidence: Patch management procedure documented
Findings: Patch deployment process needs automation

Description: The entity monitors system components and the operation of controls
Evidence: SIEM implementation and monitoring procedures
Findings: Comprehensive monitoring in place with 24/7 SOC

Description: Network controls shall be managed and controlled
Evidence: Firewall configuration and network segmentation documentation
Findings: Network properly segmented with appropriate controls

Description: The organization develops documents and maintains baseline configurations
Evidence: Configuration baselines in development
Findings: Baseline configurations not fully documented
Remediation: Complete baseline documentation for all systems

Description: The entity authorizes system changes and updates
Evidence: Change management process documentation and approval records
Findings: Robust change management process with proper approvals

Description: All relevant statutory regulatory and contractual requirements
Evidence: Legal requirements analysis and gap assessment
Findings: Some regulatory requirements not fully addressed
Remediation: Update policies to address all regulatory requirements

Description: The organization implements an incident handling capability
Evidence: Incident response plan and training records
Findings: Well-documented incident response procedures

Description: The entity assesses risks to meeting its objectives
Evidence: Risk assessment framework and initial assessments
Findings: Risk assessment process needs regular review cycles

Description: Information shall be classified in terms of legal requirements
Evidence: Data classification policy and implementation guidelines
Findings: Data classification policy well-established
Remediation: Train users on data handling requirements

Description: The information system generates audit records containing information
Evidence: Audit log configuration and retention policies
Findings: Comprehensive audit logging implemented

Description: The entity establishes structures reporting lines and appropriate authorities
Evidence: Organizational structure and governance documentation
Findings: Clear governance structure and reporting lines

Description: Information security events shall be reported through appropriate management channels
Evidence: Incident reporting procedures and escalation matrix
Findings: Clear incident reporting and escalation procedures

Description: The information system monitors and controls communications
Evidence: Network architecture documentation and boundary controls
Findings: Network boundaries properly protected with firewalls
Remediation: Regular firewall rule review and optimization

Description: The entity restricts logical access to system resources
Evidence: Identity and access management system documentation
Findings: Access controls implemented but need regular review

Description: Information security policy for system development
Evidence: Secure development guidelines in draft
Findings: Secure development practices not fully implemented

Description: The organization conducts an assessment of risk
Evidence: Enterprise risk assessment reports and methodologies
Findings: Comprehensive risk assessment process in place
